TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectPutEventArgs extends System.Management.ManagementEventArgs

Docs.summary: Holds event data for the event.
Gets the identity of the object that has been put.
Docs.value: Returns a containing the path of the object that has been put.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
## Property Value A <xref:System.Management.ManagementPath> containing the path of the object that has been put.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
